website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an organic peanut butter with good taste and low salt, try this option.
pros: Nice taste with a good level of roast
cons: Contains a little bit of salt, but not as much as non-natural brands

customer_reviews.title: Delicious REAL Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: This is REAL peanut butter -- not the stuff most of us grew up with. Rather, this is simply ground peanuts with nothing else added. Therefore, the oil will separate over time requiring it be stirred before using. Optionally, you may pour off the oil and use it in cooking; however, that dries out the peanut butter and makes it less pliable. Another option is stirring well, then refrigerating...but that challenges spreadability. Your best bet is simply to enjoy this excellent product the way nature intended...and be glad you're not ingesting hydrogenated oils, palm oil, sugar, salt, and other stabilizers! Enjoy this very healthful product! I eat it with heart-healthful celery!!
customer_reviews.author: The Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Best natural peanut butter !
customer_reviews.text: This has become the only peanut butter my husband and I want to eat. If you haven’t tried it, the fresh peanut taste will win you over. I do not like most commercial peanut butter that has that weird whipped texture
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting organic 1 ingredient peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of brands but I keep coming back to this one. It tastes so good in my oatmeal or on rice crackers. It has a sweeter taste to it, although no sugar is added. It doesn't get too dry but I do have to mix it around since natural separation happens. I only wish it was easier to find the crunchy organic one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laura Scudder's Natural Smooth Peanut Butter - YES!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stuff! My only complaint is that the bottom 1/2" was totally dry even though I stirred the oil in & kept it in the fridge so it wouldn't separate. Who knows? This is the first time that's happened & I managed to eat it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Callie & Cooper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Thick and tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peanut butter. I think they should not add no salt, although they said is less than 1% it’s salty for me. However is delicious, very thick and it’s not too creamy it actually have peanut small pieces, although they are so small you don’t even feel them. Very authentic peanut flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is good peanut butter.I make my own peanut butter at home with a Vitamix and this product is just the same. Maybe this order I can manage to get a spoon full before my daughter eats it all.
customer_reviews.author: aloispd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Best. Stir it really well and then put it in the fridge, keeps it from separating! =)
customer_reviews.author: BriaMar

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Delicious peanut butter! Tasted just like the Smucker's all natural peanut butter. Does not last long at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Natural peanut flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good natural taste and consistency. Not too smooth but the slightly course grind makes for a more homemade product feel. Peanut oil separates but can be reincorporated with a stir. Recommend getting the EZPB Natural Nut Butter Stirrer available here on Amazon. It’s easy to use and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and healthy peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: My peanut butter finally arrived today (3 jars). The taste was so clean and pure and required just a little stirring. I refrigerated after opening. I have found a new favorite brand with this "Laura Scudder's Natural Smooth Peanut Butter" brand!
customer_reviews.author: Avg Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying different peanut butters that have no added sugars. This one has the best taste of any I have tried so far. When I first opened it, I stirred it and then placed it in the refrigerator. Once it was cooled, it had a great texture. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Szatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Also so happy to find a brand which does not use palm oil. Big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: What I use for snacks and make homemade Keto peanut butter cups.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Towelie

customer_reviews.title: Scudder's is da bomb
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this peanut butter. I like a darker roasted flavor so I thought I would give it a try... I would order it again... it costs a bit more but in my opinion, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Favorite peanut butter I've ever known.
customer_reviews.text: Yes beware. You will shortly end up ordering double that of the first order you placed. Always keep one jar hidden from the rest of the friends or family. Late one night you need a big spoonful of it in the bottom of a bowl of ice cream. In solitude.
customer_reviews.author: Charming Guy on Aisle 1

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and a better price than some
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and a better price than some. A little sweet and with no sugar added. Not a huge amount of oil on top and mixes easily. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Irene E. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: The best peanut butter is one that has no added sugar, and this fits the bill. Great taste, fresh, healthy.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Why did they add Sodium?
customer_reviews.text: Why 50 mg of Sodium? I removed one star because this peanut butter would taste even better with NO SALT.
customer_reviews.author: Sherelle Red Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Less salt
customer_reviews.text: I like because there is less salt than the last brand of natural peanut butter I bought but it would be nice if it came in crunchy too.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Yummy to my tummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time trying this brand of peanut butter and loved it. It is creamy, smooth, and tastes delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Peanuts are the only ingredient, good price, it comes in a glass jar, it tastes good, etc. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Reign

customer_reviews.title: will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a delicious peanut butter!! The only thing I have trouble with is this needs to be refrigerated, and it's hard to spread on toast when it's cold...but I will definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: A1 taste, value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a keto style diet and because it has nothing but 100% peanuts in it...of course it spreads a little stiff. Great value due to excellent quality and taste.
customer_reviews.author: nancy stuart

customer_reviews.title: give this brand a look
customer_reviews.text: best tasting all natural peanut butter i have tried, better than i used too grind fresh at gnc
customer_reviews.author: keith d hartman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: We've never used this brand before but since I was ordering a few groceries decided to go with it. We found that it's just about tit for tat to Adams peanut butter, which is what I've fed my family for the past quarter of a century, in flavor and the pain to the wrist for stirring. Not bad. Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good peanut butter...not as "peanuty"as some I have tried...a little stickier.
customer_reviews.author: Maycat

customer_reviews.title: Spreads nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, it spreads easily, and does not collect a lot of oil in jar.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting peanut butter I’ve tasted
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was sold in a larger amount per jar
customer_reviews.author: johnNtexas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It definitely was not my favorite but it's not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste as good as other products that cost slightly more.
customer_reviews.author: lt

customer_reviews.title: Dark roasted
customer_reviews.text: Like so many, too darkly roasted. Otherwise a fine value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: That your refund or replacement is impossible
customer_reviews.text: My jar was broken and I cant seen to get to where I can get a refund because its a non refundable item. The box shows no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Could not be any better - the Perfect smooth peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: - best of all brands tried so far --- perfectly roasted and the very lightly salted flavor synergistic with crackers
customer_reviews.author: karlsondude

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: The peanut butter separated in the jar and ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Naumann Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the original healthy peanut butter. Nothing but peanuts and a little salt.
customer_reviews.author: EMKAPLAN
